text: Igor Sergeyevich Ivanov (Russian: Игорь Сергеевич Иванов; born 23 September 1945) is a Russian politician. He was a Foreign Minister of Russia from 30 September 1998 to 24 February 2004. == Other websites == * RussianCouncil.ru Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Moscow Category:Soviet politicians Category:Russian diplomats
title: Igor Ivanov
